hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Deku Shield#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #0# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Kokiri Shop#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Mido's house#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #the Fire Arrows# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #2# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Right Bottom Fake Wall Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #the Serenade of Water#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to the #Light Medallion#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.
